title: Social Media Community Guidelines
body:
GetUp creates change by giving everyday people the tools to have their say on important issues.

We use social media to reach out to our members and potential members, and to create a space where people can discuss the issues that matter to them.

We believe that people have the right to express their opinions, but we ask that you do so in a respectful way. We will remove comments that:

- Are abusive, harassing or threatening

- Contain offensive language

- Are defamatory or libelous

- Are racist, sexist, homophobic or otherwise discriminatory

- Are spam or self-promotion

- Are off-topic or irrelevant

If you see a comment that you believe violates these guidelines, please report it to us.

We reserve the right to ban users who repeatedly violate these guidelines.
